div.div: Sul Ross State vs. Texas Lutheran

tr.td: TLU wins toss. TLU will receive. SRSU will defend south goal.
Adom Valenzuela kickoff 46 yards to the TLU19, Drake Dowling return 20 yards to the TLU39 (Cordrick Mobley).
PENALTY SRSUFB personal foul 15 yards to the SRSUFB46, 1ST DOWN TLU.
Trenton White pass incomplete to M. Barrolle (Jimmie Jones).
Trenton White pass complete to Deion Barnes for 6 yards to the SRSUFB40 (Earl Hines).
